text: وَقَالُواْ مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشِي فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا

translation.en: And they say, "What is this messenger that eats food and walks in the markets? Why was there not sent down to him an angel so he would be with him a warner
translation.id: Dan mereka berkata, "Mengapa Rasul (Muhammad) ini memakan makanan dan berjalan di pasar-pasar? Mengapa malaikat tidak diturunkan kepadanya (agar malaikat) itu memberikan peringatan bersama dia
